instruction: Given two people, generate a comparative evaluation of their performances.
output: Person A is highly motivated and puts in a lot of effort in their work. They are also dedicated and able to finish tasks with great accuracy. On the other hand, Person B is more of a big-picture thinker and is better at planning and strategizing. They usually come up with innovative ideas that are effective. Both are excellent employees and it is difficult to say which one is better.
